====Usage notes====
* The term can be used when a similar concept is used in Japan and China or when a Chinese term does not clearly describe an object, e.g. {{zh-l|拉麵/拉面}} can refer to a Chinese dish "la mian", not (Japanese) [[ramen]] or {{zh-l|動畫/动画}} refers to any type animation, not necessarily to (Japanese) [[anime]].
